p.k: We got hits. We got hits from the 80s. And guess what? They don't stop! You're welcome!
We're sending out feel-good vibes of 80s music! Join us as we countdown 40 songs that'll make you smile. and sing!
We're powering-up the time machine and going back to celebrate the first years of our MTV lives! This time we land in. 1983!
Check out all of the best hits from one of the biggest decades in music!
The power of love is strong here at MTV which is why we've put all of the best 80s love songs together in one playlist!
Tune in as we play all of the biggest electronic hits from the 80s!
Hard! Alternative! Heavy! Post-punk! Metal! Indie! Goth! Call it what you want, but turn up the volume as we delve into the decade's best rock tracks
Get ready because we're bringing you nothing but classic hits and iconic anthems from the 80s!
